channel.title: BotF IX - Call for Distress - Evil wins
channel.description:
https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-signups-15-15-game-will-start-soon/88559
Threadmarks -
[Night One Begins - 15/15 Alive](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-night-1-15-15/88620/2?u=kyodaz)
[Day One ends with Gorta being executed and dies](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/1883?u=crichard564)
[Night Two has ended with Leafia found dead in the night](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/1886?u=crichard564)
Nomination History -
[details="Day One"] 1. Zone_Q11 nominates thepigeonnyc > [details="Zone_Q11's Accusation"] > [quote="Zone_Q11, post:261, topic:88620"] > Down with the slankers. > [/quote] > [/details] > > >[details=thepigeonnyc's Defence] >[quote="thepigeonnyc, post:330, topic:88620, full:true"] >I have literally no reason not to open claim. > >King here! >[/quote] >[/details]
2. Cloned Cheese has nominated Zone_Q11 Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/351?u=crichard564 Defence: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/363?u=crichard564

4. Nuclear_Rehab has nominated An_Gorta_Pratai. Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/638?u=crichard564 https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/642?u=crichard564 Defence: Not applicable.
5. Atlas has nominated Nuclear_Rehab, Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/662?u=crichard564 https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/663?u=crichard564 Defence: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/673?u=crichard564
6. Leafia nominates Nightingale. Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/554?u=crichard564 Defence: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/580?u=crichard564 https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/581?u=crichard564
[/details]
[details="Day Two"] 1. thepigeonnyc has nominated Zone_Q11. Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/2452?u=crichard564 Defence:
2, Nightingale has nominated ElithePsycho. Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/2464?u=crichard564 Defence:
3. Wazza has nominated Intensify. Accusation: Defence:
4. Leafia has nominated Nightingale. Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/2477 Defence:

[/details] [details="Day Three"] [/details] Exile History - [details="Day One"] 1. ElithePsycho has called for the exile of Apprentice. Accusation: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/852?u=crichard564 Defence: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/854?u=crichard564 [/details]
[details="Day Two"] 1. Eli has called for the exile of Wazza. https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/2619?u=crichard564
2. PokemonKidRyan has called for the exile of Apprentice. https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/botf-ix-call-for-distress-day-2-15-17/88620/3065?u=crichard564 [/details] [details="Day Three"] [/details]
Voting History - [details="Day One"] an_Gorta_pratai - 11 execute votes and executed. Nuclear_Rehab - 1 execute vote and 6 pardon votes. SkyRed - 0 execute votes and 7 pardon votes. thepigeonnyc - 0 execute votes and 7 pardon votes. Zone_Q11 - 2 execute votes and 6 pardon votes. Nightingale - 3 execute votes and 3 pardon votes. Apprentice - 0 votes for exile.
[/details] [details="Day Two"] [/details] [details="Day Three"] [/details]
Seating Order -
1. Silviu200530 2. Nuclear_Rehab 3. clonedcheese 4. ~~SkyRED~~ Jane 5. an_gorta_pratai 6. thepigeonnyc 7. Atlas 8. EliThePsycho 9. YoubutWorse 10. ~~Tangeld~~ Whysper 11. Zone_Q11 12. Leafia 13. PokemonKidRyan 14. Nightingale 15. Intensify 16. [color=steblue]Appre[/color][color=red]ntice[/color] (Beggar) (Traveled Away d3) 17. [color=steblue]Waz[/color][color=red]za[/color] (Scapegoat)
